price: Wͻn a wͻnnyi Zaka no, Daakye no wͻnom ne (Kaafirfoͻ) boniayεfoͻ no.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhīna lā yu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
